hero.title: Interior <0>Design</0> That Elevates Everyday Living
hero.description: Welcome to Decoright, your trusted partner for refined interior design and decor solutions. We bring your vision to life with creativity, functionality, and style.

services.subheader: From offices to living rooms, we craft layouts, finishes and custom pieces that reflect your lifestyle and improve how you use the space.

showcases.subheader: High-fidelity concept imagery and styled scenes that demonstrate our signature looks and design thinking.

faqs.subheader: Common questions about our process and timelines simple, practical answers so you can decide with confidence.

login.subheader: Enter your credentials to access your account and manage your design requests.
login.no_account_label: Don't have an account yet? <0>Sign up</0>

signup.subheader: Create an account to start your design journey with us.

verify_otp.subheader: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to <0>{{email}}</0>. Enter it below to complete your signup.
